actions.committee: House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs.
Reported to House from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs with amendment, H. Rept. 96-382.
Measure passed House, amended, with an amendment to the title.

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

official_title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Clear Creek County, Colorado, to Harold and Doris Harlan.

summary.text: Directs the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Clear Creek County, Colorado, to Harold and Doris Harlan, upon payment of administrative costs for the conveyance. Reserves mineral and prospecting rights to the United States, with certain exceptions.

titles.title: A bill to direct the Secretary of the Interior to convey certain lands in Clear Creek County, Colorado, to Harold and Doris Harlan.
